text: Wonderful keynote presentation at #RCSIResearchDay today by Prof Adrian Hill on the development of the  @UniofOxford @AstraZeneca #COVID19 #vaccine.  We are very grateful to him & all the scientists involved for their incredible work over the past 14months. #believeinscience https://t.co/Z0iuz5gzcJ https://t.co/Wdm2V40HIK
